Title: Useful PowerShell Automation Script (Highly reusable) for SharePoint 2010&2013
Description: Repository of useful Powershell automation scripts which are often required for SharePoint Point Projects
HomeWiki:
Reusable Ready PowerShell Scripts for various daily need of SharePoint projects

All the PowerShell scripts are available for download in downloads section.

  1. Empty recycle bin of all site collections (parameter: web application URL)
  2. Get AD Group Members in specific OU of Active Directory (parameter: outcome CSV file path, OU search string)
  3. Scan Local files and folders and make it ready for migration ( It's pre-migration utility to ensure whether all folders and files are ready for migration to SharePoint or not, if not then help in auto fixing to make it ready)

.. more will be added soon

Let's NOT reinvent, LET's reuse... and make swift deliveries

If you do have more then please share..

:-) Happy sharing
